overview: Seven teenagers travel by a trajinera over Xochimilco waters. Two of them use a witchboard and become possessed. The teenagers soon are arrive on an island, where one by one are murdered by their possessed friends.

production_companies.name: Producciones Cesar Balestra S.A. de C.V.

tagline: Anything can happen when the dead decide to intervene...
title: La trajinera del terror
